level.heading: Uniformity of application and construction.
level.text: In applying and construing this subchapter, consideration shall be given to the need to promote uniformity of the law with respect to its subject matter among states that enact it.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 17-145
level.text: For Law 17-145, see notes following ยง 7-1531.01.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based upon ยง 24 of the Revised Uniform Anatomical Gift Act (2006).
